response.overview: In a glowing, infinite space, “One” depicts the journey of an artist who faces adversity and transcends his reality to arrive at a higher consciousness of his art. Created and produced by Studio Simkin. Renowned choreographer David Dawson and star ballet dancer Daniil Simkin create an emotional journey that reflects the struggle and rebirth of artists in a changing world. By moving through fear, isolation, and distress, the dancer comes to understand the transformative power of his art and its potential to awaken new understanding.
response.title: One
